long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Search Extension for Chrome

By clicking 'Add to Chrome,' you accept and agree to install Search Trust, set it as your default search tool, and agree to our Terms of Use and Privacy Policy. The default search setting will be provided by Microsoft Bing.

Privacy policy: https://thesearchtrust.com/privacy/
Terms: https://thesearchtrust.com/eula/
Contact: https://thesearchtrust.com/contact/
